small: S (1-4 days): Single component or API endpoint. Well-understood technology. Minimal dependencies. Example: Add filtering to existing list.
medium: M (5-10 days): Complete feature or screen. Standard complexity. Some dependencies. Example: Build user profile page (view + edit).
large: L (11-15 days): Multiple related features. Higher complexity or new technology. Multiple dependencies. Example: Complete checkout flow (4 steps).
extra_large: XL (16+ days): RED FLAG - consider splitting. Only acceptable if feature genuinely cannot be split.

complexity_factors.high_risk: Add 2-3 days for proof of concept
complexity_factors.multiple_components: Add 1 day per additional major component
